name: Intrust Global
description:
Intrust Global eServices Private Limited is a customer driven organization founded with the objective of rendering high quality and timely Knowledge and Legal services to clients.  
Intrust Global is part of the group of companies which include Kanoria Chemicals & Industries Limited (KCI), KPL International Limited (KPL), Kanoria Ethiopia Textiles Plc, Ludlow Jute & Specialities Limited (LJS), APAG Group & Suprawin Technologies Limited.
